welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Mariana, Philippines! Get ready to experience the charm of our city and discover its rich culture, delicious cuisine, and stunning landscapes. We hope you have an unforgettable stay and enjoy all that Mariana has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and largest terminal at Ninoy Aquino International Airport, serving mostly international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Also known as the Centennial Terminal, it is the newest terminal at the airport and serves a mix of international and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest and largest terminal at Ninoy Aquino International Airport, serving mostly international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: Also known as the Domestic Terminal, it serves domestic flights for local airlines.

wifi.note: WiFi is available for free for 2 hours per device. Additional hours can be purchased.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal of Baler Airport serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: A separate terminal dedicated for handling cargo and freight services.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.
